name: com.observater.aiskills
description:
AI Skills is an editor automation tool that bridges Large Language Models (LLM) with Unity's Python execution environment. It allows developers to control the Unity Editor using natural language commands.

Key Features:
▪ GameObject Management: Create, find, and manipulate scene objects.
▪ Component Control: Automatically add and configure components like Rigidbodies and Colliders.
▪ Asset Pipeline: Find, move, and manage project assets via Python scripts.
▪ UI Generation: Instantly create functional UI hierarchies (Canvas, Text, Buttons).
▪ Prefab Workflow: Instantiate and save prefabs programmatically.
